summary: Home sale assistance allows federal agencies to facilitate the sale of employees' homes if their relocation is in the government's interest. Veterans Affairs suspended a type of home sale assistance in 2015 after two employees abused it for personal gain. In 2017, VA reinstated this assistance with strengthened safeguards. title: Employee Relocation: VA Strengthened Appraised Value Offer's Controls, but Can Improve Efforts to Track Effects on Retention and Recruitment
